title: Cultural Program to be conducted concurrently with the Celebration of  the International Day of Vesak declared by the UN
decision_details: - The Hon. S.B. Navinne, the Minster of Internal Affairs, Wayamba Development and Cultural Affairs brought to the notice of the Cabinet that the special cultural event organized this year, concurrently with the International Day of Wesak - 2017 is scheduled to be held in Sri Lanka  at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) on the 12th of May 2017 and also at the Nelum Pokuna Theatre on the 13th May 2017.
